reviews.review: sicuramente da giocare. un nuovp modo di intendere uno sparatutto. quasi geniale.

Uno de los mejores juegos del 2013. Una historia impactante, unos gráficos excelentes y una jugabilidad adictiva. 
La historia gira alrededor de Elizabeth que se encuentra "atrapada" en una torre a la cual deberemos acudir para poder rescatarla y nosotros estaremos en el papel de Booker DeWitt. 
Los enemigos y enfrentamientos son tan intensos que es dificil no perderse en el mundo de Columbia (una ciudad flotante). Aunque todo lo que conlleva este juego merece una felicitación, lo que más destaca, desde mi punto de vista, es el argumento que fue tan cuidado y con un final tan impactante que hará explotar tu cabeza en 100 pedazos. 
Próximamente se estrenará el último DLC del juego en cuestión donde veremos en acción como nunca antes a Elizabeth. Yo, por mi parte, lo espero con ansias. 

Nota >>> 95/100

I'm honestly infatuated with this game.  There's no other way to say it without me babbling a passionate and incoherent mess.  I'm going through a second walkthrough and have definite plans to get my hands on the season pass.  It's incredibly rich and smart in its art design, which I simply can't get over, as it is an ambitious in its plot and themes.

Meilleur jeu de tout les temps!

Excellents graphiques , histoire intriguante et touchante 

100/100
Wem Bioshock gefällt der wird auch mit dem neuen Setting klarkommen
Pretty graphics, better-than-average shooting, and a story worthy of a Star Trek episode.

If walking through a motion picture is your thing, this game is for you. The story and progression is quite linear, but that isn't to say it is a bad story. It's quite good. The game looks gorgeous, comes with gruesome kills and a whole bunch of find-it achievements that were designed to cause your inner OCD child to have a meltdown, seeing as you can't backtravel if you missed something. 

My biggest complaint is the bland combat. While visually exciting to watch the effects of certain vigors on the enemies, you're really only fighting them to progress the story and watch the violent outcome of your light gun. There is no grit to the combat. There's no rush from escaping impending doom, no real penalty for dying (even played on hardest difficulty, which I highly recommend to anyone who has ever used a mouse before), and with the exception of one obtusely difficult enemy which you only see a few (3?) times in the game, it's a walk in the park. Not including the one boss, and counting different colored grunts using a shotgun versus a machinegun as one type, there are only five (5!) enemies in the game. You're shooting things to watch them go boom so you can listen to Elizabeth discover the outside world.

If the exploration factor and the storyline wasn't as good as it is, I'd have put this down and been upset at my purchase. Really the only thing that made it difficult was trying to get all the achievements in one playthrough, a choice I decided upon as my own difficulty modifier, because the game was simply too easy.

Buy it on sale, or wait for a sale. Also so far, season pass has Burial at Sea pt 1 (took me 2 hours, and that was turning over every stone and attempting all achievements), and a wave mode where you compete for high score with CiTC. Unfortunately, a wave mode is only fun if the combat is entertaining.

Tips:

-Play on hard.
-Once you leave an area, it's gone. Do your searching, side questing, and loot hording before you leave the area (you're prompted yes/no).
-Upgrade the items you like. You will not obtain enough money to upgrade even half of your items and vigors. I died maybe 6 times (the only way to lose money, even then it's VERY minimal, almost trivial) through the whole game, and I'd like to think I hoovered every inch of everywhere.
-You'll have enough lockpicks. Open it. It's always worth it.
-If you buy the DLC, the only way to get your infusions is at the BEGINNING of the game. Don't try the game, then buy the DLC. You'll miss out on half of your early bird bonus.
-If Elizabeth stops to look at a random pile of junk, you probably should too. 75% of the time, there's something there.

Just like the previous BioShock games, Infinite is filled with an encapsulating ambiance that immerses you into an amazing world that is changing slowly and constantly. The end of the game will leave you with a "Would you kindly..." type of experience that leaves your jaw on the floor salivating for more.

Do not forget to stick around for what happens after the credits...if you can handle the awful guitar playing filled with fret buzz and missed notes to make it past the credits.

ЭТО-ШЕДЕВР!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 10/10!!!

А Элизабет такая милашка)))

This game is a must buy, it really lives up to the original, it's a fun play throughout the entire game, and it's immersive story keeps you exited till the very end. The gameplay is one of the best FPS gameplay there is, it sometimes get's a little dull but if you use enough vigors, try new things and combos it's good. I loved almost all the characters from the game but I would have liked to see even more backstory on some characters then was in the game. Booker Dewitt is an amazing persona, and Troy Baker(voice actor did an amazing job). I have never cared so much for any video game character more than I cared for Elizabeth. I would like to thank Ken Levine and his team at Irrational for making this masterpiece.

The story is great, but everything else...not so much. It's sad, I really wanted to like this game being a big fan of bioshock 1 and 2. What I disliked the most was the combat. Running out of ammo is a huge pain in the ass in this game, it basically means you are dead especially if you are also out of vigor. Finding more vigor is a pain in the ass as well. I didn't particularlly like any of the vigors. The combat feels....wonky. Thoughout the whole game I could never have fun fighting. None of your skills seem to go together very well. The tougher enemies were boring and/or cheap. Fighting handymen is basically going on a rail until the handyman jumps on the rail, then jumping off and hitting the handyman until he's stopped being electrocuted and jumping back on the rail to repeat. The enemies I found were as boring and generic as the weapons I used to kill them. Some of the weapons you can use are very shitty, and you are forced to use them if you run out of a good weapon ammo and that weapon is the only thing close by.  I could go on and on but I'm sure there are other reviews that explain these problems much better than I can. What kept me going to the end of the game is the story, which is very well done. Would only recommend this game for die hard bioshock fans who would buy this without reading any reviews like me.

"Вы думали, улицы выстланы золотом, но они залиты кровью и слезами! Но сегодня наши слезы станут золотом, а ваши — кровью!"

Те кто пройдут эту игру еще нескоро забудут запутанный, сложный, но чертовски интересный финал. Финал который ставит почти все точки над "И", но не все. Еще остается простор для домысливания. Эффект после прохождения игры близок к эффекту создаваемому концовкой фильма "Начало".

Игра примечательна тем, что нас не сразу бросают в бой, дав консервный нож в одну руку и плазмид (который здесь называется "вигор") в другую. Мы можем побродить по Колумбии, удивиться чудесам инженерной мысли, красивым пейзажам, спокойствию чарящему на улицах. Весь экшен еще впереди.

Что хотелось бы особенно отметить: Элизабет, девушку которую мы должны спасти. Персонаж получился очень живым, ярким, эмоциональным. Она не просто компьютерный болванчик, который будет молча бегать за вами, периодически попадая под огонь противника. Она как живая. То подойдет, рассмотрит постер, то присядет, то включит игровой автомат. В бою от нее только польза, потому что регулярно она будет находить и давать вам патроны, аптечки и соли (аналог адама).

В общем игра вышла исключительно хорошей, с интересным сюжетом, нескучным геймплеем и невероятно красивыми видами. Есть и эмоционыльные моменты, и отсылки к предыдущим частям, что будет приятно фанатам серии. 

ВСЕМ РЕКОМЕНДУЮ

bioshock infinite is by far one of the most intense game i have ever played.
It has a strong plot and also a rather puzzling yet intriguing ending; not to mention good graphics and an overall enjoyable game if you're the kind of person who just likes FPS.
Such a fantastic game, and thumbs up to Irrational Gaming for enabling a whole new gaming experience!

this game is what

BioShock Infinite it's a clearly overrated game. After the underwhelming BioShock 2 everyone thought about the next installment of the BioShock series by the original author (Irrational Games) as the true sequel and created this myth in their minds but the real game is just an average one. It' begins with a very flat start. The world is a dead one, the graphics are 'very artificial' (it's like playing Myst with a gun) and there is not much to do... then begins the FPS part with mediocre playability (controls just not up to par with the competition.. ok I got spoiled by Borderlands and Fallout, mediocre physics, uninteresting AI) and the adventure part too it's just boring. It redeem itself towards the end but anyway it's not enough to put the game beyond an 'average' rating. It's a game I would not like to play again, 'boring' and 'clunky' are the two words that comes to my mind.
Looks great and the story is what you would expect from a bioshock game. Had a great time highley recommend 10/10

This game had a very interesting story with awesome powerups. I love how it takes palce in early 1900s. The game play and dialogue is amazing yet hillarious. 10/10 in my book.

This game is sensational...pushes all the right buttons if you enjoy your FPS and enjoy a very interesting story. From the moment I started, I could not stop...every word spoken by the characters, to every detail of the world around you is just made to impress.

This game should always be in your game collection!!

Thank you Irrational Games for this epic tale.

Ce jeux m'a donné envie de faire les premiers quand j'ai vu la bande-annonce à la télé.
Du coup je les ai fait, j'ai aimé. Par contre une fois arrivé au troisième ce n'était pas exactement le même ressentit. J'avais l'impression que j'avais changé de jeux. On retrouvais toujours les éléments de base tel que les pouvoirs et les armes, mais l'histoire avait changé. Moi gore, mon trash, moins effrayant. Presque un monde de bisounours si il n'y avait pas eu les méchant qui veulent vous tuer. 

Bon jeux mais assez différent du 1 et du 2

1. 아, 스토리 정리 안 되서 머리 아픈 게임... 스토리 리뷰를 찾아보고 이해를 좀 하게 됨
2. 1, 2를 해봐야 좀 더 이해도가 올라감
3. 전작에 비해 좀 지루한 전투
5. UI는 좀 편해졌음
6. 공간 활용을 위해 설치해 놓은 레일인 '스카이 라인'은 어지럽기만 하고 맵을 효율적으로 활용하기에는 무리가 있었던 듯
7. 여러 가지 무기를 활용하게 해놓은 것 같은데 업그레이드 비용이 모자라기도 하고 숙련도 문제도 있어서 결국에는 한 두 개 정도로 압축해야 쾌적한 플레이를 보장 받는 듯.
8. 자주 쓰는 무기를 탄알이 없어서 버리면 다시 얻기 힘듦
9. 그래픽은 훌륭함
10. 아트 스타일이 인간들을 뭔가 다 마네킹처럼 만들어 놨음... 컨셉인가?
11. 난 이 게임은 컨트롤 패드로 하는 게 더 좋더라
12. 잔인한 연출이 많음
13. 1이나 2편에 받았던 재미와 충격을 느끼기에는 부족했던 느낌임
14. 서브 캐릭터가 체력 회복 아이템과 탄알을 공급해주는 플레이가 놀랍고 멋있었음
15. 스토리를 즐기기 위해서 이 장치 저 장치 다 열어봐야 하는데 너무 오래 걸려서 빡침
16. 스토리 설명한 블로그 : http://blog.naver.com/cowai?Redirect=Log&logNo=60192431612

Great gameplay, amazing plot, a mindfuck of a game based on branching universes. Best ending I've ever seen after Mass Effect 3. A true masterpiece.

Excellent game play. Dynamic, interesting characters. Fun game mechanics. Beautiful scenery, modeling and artwork. The story was engaging, drawing the player to want to finish the game to know how it all ties together.  Ending was a little predictable, but well executed and not at all kitschy. Definitely has replay power.
The ending is very good; not quite as "amazing! spectacular! wow!" as everybody else says, but it's good.

This may be the best game I have ever played, I love the story to a level that I've never reached before. The way the game was planned out just touches your heart. I can't say much because I do not want to spoil it, but you get so attached to the characters. I find that amazing actually. Gameplay wise, IT IS PRETTY DAMN FUN! I've been a fan of all the Bioshock games so I highly recomend this game. If you manage to get this game on sale, it is such a steal. You will enjoy every second of playing this masterpice.

The fantastic finish the trilogy deserved, Bioshock infinite manages to live up to the insanely high expectations that the first game of the trilogy set. With improved gunplay, an awesome new setting, new gunplay, and a great story, it's practically everything you could want in a Bioshock game. If you are even remotely interested in FPS games, this is a game you practically have to own.

Если не петь дифирамбы, а говорить по существу, то игра представляет из себя обычный коридорный шутер (а других, наверное, и не бывает). Но коридорный шутер того же качества, что и предыдущие части. Благодаря подачи сюжета, всех условностей рельс, по которым приходится бежать, просто не замечаешь. Средств уничтожения противников – более чем достаточно. Хочешь пулей, а хочешь магией. Хочешь сам, а хочешь натрави другого.  Картинка действительно прекрасна, как и ранее. На фоне всей этой сказочности и яркости особенно неожиданно смотрится первое довольно кровавое убийство в игре .Музыка, персонажи – все на высоте. Только как по мне - перестрелок можно было бы и добавить немного. Отдельно хотелось бы отметить няшную героиню – ей можно долго любоваться. Однако где те 10 из 10, что ей все ставят – мне не ясно. Игра просто действительно качественно сделана, но она не привносит в жанр чего-то нового и не открывает новые горизонты. Если бы мне кто-то раскрыл бы ее величие – был бы благодарен.
Что касается сюжета – последние мгновения все портят. Если поначалу действительно интересно, то ближе к концу все становится понятно и обыденно. Ну а попытка привнести нечто философское в финал вызывает только смех и вопрос «что это было?».

Bioshock Infinite was one of the best games I have ever played in my whole entire life. The story is incredible, plus the twist at the end. You will get a flood of emotions because of the plot and you will be incredibly confused, so you will have to look up an explanation. The graphics were beautiful, I even fell in love with Elizabeth :'( <3. 
Holy mother of Jesus it was amazing. Get your ass and put it on your seat, get nice and comfy and finish this game. 
P.S you'll need a lot of lockpicks!

A game with stunning visuals and entertaining gameplay I would have to say it is one of the better games that has come out recently. The storyline is engaging and there is good character development throughout the game as you explore and learn more about Columbia. Elizabeth is one of the better companions as she is not just there to be protected but plays an active role during combat and is a relatable character who changes as the game progresses.
Greatest ending to a game since EVER

Это прекрасная игра, если вы по какой то причине засомневались стоит ли её покупать, то вот что я вам скажу: стоит, эта игра стоит тех денег что вы за неё заплатите, а я бы заплатил ещё больше, если бы у меня были деньги и была бы такая возможность. Создатели культовых игр System Shock и оригинального Bioshock продолжают соблюдать свои традиции. Необыкновенный сюжет, который с самого начала повествования захватывает вас, а под конец игры поражает. Если вы играли в оригианльный Bioshock, то   вы не останетесь разочарованы. На первый взгляд, кажется, что эта игра не имеет никакого отношения к той игре 2008 года, но это не так, и всё тесно взаимосвязанно. Дизайнеры постарались на славу и создали пропитанный атмосферой тех времён мир, в котором вам не предстоит заскучать ни на минуту. Особенно любопытные игроки смогут найти приятные мелочи оставленные разработчиками, не буду говорить какие. А после прохождения игры вам наверняка захочется пройти её вновь. Причиной тому сюжет, манера повествования. Кому то покажется неприемлемым, что для того чтобы самому понять всё что произошло, необходимо быть внимательным, а то и пройти игру не один раз, но как по мне это не недостаток, это большой плюс. В общем я не вдаваюсь в подробности, вердикт всему вышесказанному: вам стоит в это сыграть, чтобы понять до каких высот могут дойти современные игры и что не всё ещё потеряно и в мире есть разработчики игр, которые могут вас удивлять до замирания сердца.

This was my first Bioshock game. I knew they were highly regarded, but didn't really know what to expect. All I can say now that I've completed the game is WOW. It's just great. It's one of the most immersive games I've ever played. It really drags you in and the story is deeply compelling. The ending, and how it all ties together is worthy of a hollywood blockbuster. The world they created is so real and beautiful and the policital undertones that play in the background really add to the feeling of the time period. It's quite short, but it's well worth it. All I want to do now that I've finished it is play it again.
Amazing story, great characters, gameplay, and graphics. Highy recommend to anyone.

전작들은 좀비호러물에 가까웠다면 이번작은 유쾌한 액션 분위기랄까? 물론 플레이 하면 할수록 유쾌하기보단 찝찝한 기분이 더 들긴 하지만..

장점은 다른 리뷰 보면 알테고, 단점은 전작이랑 별로 달라질 것 없는 전투스타일과 반복적인 플레이, 보스전의 부재, 선형적인 구성 정도? 바숔2는 멀티엔딩이었는데... 총을 두개밖에 못드는것도 짜증남. DLC에선 고쳐지긴 했지만. 불만스런게 몇 개 더 있는데 스포일러라서 말안함.

그리고 베리얼 앳더씨는 무조건 사야함. 막장테크 이전의 랩쳐를 볼 수 있다! 랩쳐에서 스카이후크도 탈수있음!

Ever since this game came out I have been meaning to buy and to play it. After buying it on the steam winter sale it still took me 2 months before I took the time to play it. 

A few tings bother me, such as dying in battle doesn't really reset the battle, the lack of saving manually and loading, playing at Hard isn't really hard, the enemy just gets a bit more stubborn.

Besides from those points, it's probably one of the better games I have played, I really love the story (some things make less sense but overall). I really like that Elizabeth doesn't  follow you in a sense as a linear sense and instead walk around in the area where you are. 
I really like the way the story goes, it has a few twists, some not so obvious as others. It feels like you have a choice in some scenes when you actualyl can't really change the outcome. Early in the game I started to think of some things that later turned out to be so but during that time I was unsure and it powered me to play more to find out. 

The game has a range of weapons but you can only carry two weapons at any given time which forces you to pick one lighter weapon but with more ammo and one heavy hitter for those tougher enemies. 

The Vigors/plasmids that are available are quite fun but I found that the "Return to sender" was a bit too overpowered. I mean, absorbing all bullets and then voila, you have a really powerful grenade. And with some boosts you can get ammo this way to...

Bottom line, this is a really good game. Compared to the original bioshock this game has a more obvious story from the beginning and it powers you to play more. It misses some elements from the original game where it was you against a crazy underwater city where you had to survive. In this game you have a clear goal that will affect how you percieve the gameplay and it's no longer you being alone against "crazy" people.

Just bought the tiple pack for R$ 13.99 i love you steam and your bugs!

I would reccommend playing through the first two games before this one, for story reasons. YOU WILL LOVE THEM GUARANTEED. apart from that, unbeliavble game series. I HAVE NO COMPLAINTS WHATSOEVER. The deepest storyline I have ever seen in games or even in movies, the best voice acting, sound development, visuals and gameplay you will find anywhere. I have dabbled around. This series is unmatched. this is the forbidden fruit of gaming trilogies. once played, you will never find another game series like this one, so you might as well play it through, cry for a week in euphoria, and move on with your life for the betterment of society.
A beautifully crafted game. Stunning in every field including gameplay, visual, sound and acting, this game delivers an experience as deep as the ocean that will leave your head in the clouds.

Fun, but uninspired and bland.  The plotline and characters are unique and the visuals and audio are what you expect for this generation of game, but not enough to keep the samey controls and gameplay interesting.  A sad, bland chapter in the "Shock" series.
One of the most twisted stories I've ever had the pleasure of experiencing.  The gameplay is equal to the story in terms of greatness.  Worth every dollar.

Just remember that all those bad reviews are just haters who don't undersatnd the story, but I will cut them some slack because once you beat this game you will have to think this story through, it gets you thinking. But this is a good game, I do wish it was a little longer though. Gran juego, un FPS que tiene una gran variedad de formas de luchas, que tiene la mejor ambientación del año, que tiene una magnífica historia, unos protagonistas carismáticos, unos secundarios también rebosantes de carisma, y un gran final. Muy, muy recomendable.
Excelente juego!!!
The end will change your life.
Quite possibly the best game ever made. Worth playing just for the story alone, 4 playthroughs down and i'm still having eurika moments.
Best game I played in 2013 by far, would recommend it to anyone.

Dieses Spiel ist ein Meisterwerk! Es zeigt einfach, wie man einen Shooter spannend und packend inszeniert! Selbst beim zweiten durchspielen wurde ich immer noch von der Story beeindruckt und überwältigt. Dieses Spiel, und auch die Vorgänger, ist der beste Shooter den ich je gespielt habe. Wenn ihr euch für so etwas interessiert (Shooter, Anfang 20. Jahrhundert als Zeitpunkt), dann kauft euch dieses Spiel!

О боже =), я под таким впечатление от игры. Последний раз меня так всецело захватывала игра "Принц Персии: Схватка с судьбой", сюжет игры завязанный на времени, шикарный. В игре все супер и картинка и геймплэй и сюжет все так гармонично переплетается идеальный баланс. Моя оценка игре 10 из 10.
Один из лучших шутеров, в который я когда-либо играл.Отличный сюжет,хорошая графика,интересные персонажи:в этой игре есть всё.Безусловно,игра стоит своих денег.
I enjoyed this immensely, but I can't help but feel that it's not as fleshed out as it was originally intended to be.
